item.description: read-only user Adding the new MySQL user Connect to your database as root, then add your new user like so: CREATE USER ‘lele’@‘%’ IDENTIFIED BY ‘lele_lelelele’; The % here means the user ‘tester’ connecting from any host, you can place a network hostname here instead if you want to restrict access further.
